title: Histopathological evaluation of needle tract seeding caused by EUS-fine-needle biopsy based on resected specimens from patients with solid pancreatic masses: An analysis of 73 consecutive cases
patient: The patient was a 66-year-old man with acinar cell carcinoma who underwent total pancreatectomy []. Microscopy showed a small isolated tumor in the muscle layer separate from the main lesion and on the puncture route, suggestive of NTS.
